name: Have You Tried Turning It Off?
name_original: Have You Tried Turning It Off?
description:
I felt pretty down when I first thought of the idea for this game back in 2013, and I felt the need to bring it back up. Hopefully more people get catharsis from this rather than feeling down, but just incase:

Suicide Prevention Hotline (US): 1-800-273-8255

List of international numbers: http://www.suicide.org/international-suicide-hotlines.html

----------------------

This game was developed as part of the 04/11/2020 - 04/19/2020 ODO Game Jam.
